memberdef.name: SYSMACRO
memberdef.initializer: if (bool(fullcorrelated)) { \ m_syst_description[CP::SystematicVariation(#name, +1)] = SysInfo{always, flagup}; \ m_syst_description[CP::SystematicVariation(#name, -1)] = SysInfo{always, flagdown}; \ } \ else { \ int i = 0; \ for (const auto& p : AbsEtaCaloPredicatesFactory(decorrelation)) { \ m_syst_description[CP::SystematicVariation(#name "__ETABIN" + std::to_string(i), +1)] = SysInfo{p, flagup}; \ m_syst_description[CP::SystematicVariation(#name "__ETABIN" + std::to_string(i), -1)] = SysInfo{p, flagdown}; \ i += 1; \ } \ }
